item.description:
• Do you have thoughts, emotions, reactions, or any fears that persist and have a hold on you? Feel like they just happen and are out of your control?Do you feel like sometimes “reality” is just too hard to talk your way around?
  • Do you find that you sometimes react to situations or circumstances in ways that cause stress or negative “drama”?
  • Are you stuck in limiting beliefs, unable to shift them?

Our experience of reality is created by the meaning and interpretations we give what is before us, and the subsequent stories we tell. This is what we react to, and what determines how we respond and act moving forward, and also what we allow into our life, or not.

In this class, you’ll learn a simple five step process to:

  • easily catch yourself and prevent unnecessary internal and external dramas and stress
  • loosen your beliefs that limit you
  • set you free to feel and be as you desire

It only takes minutes, or less; and it all starts with one question that you’ll never want to forget.

We believe and have experienced for ourselves and our coaching clients that this is one of the most powerful strategies you can learn!  We look forward to sharing it with you!

Please be considerate of your hosts and only RSVP if you intend to show up, and change your RSVP or let us know if your plans change after RSVP'ing.  Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: PARK ON ODD SIDE OF STREET ONLY.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: The One Question That Will Set You Free!
